creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and Gift of funds from Thirza Cleveland and Joan Wurtele
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: white, pink, red, green and yellow discontinuous supplementary weft patterning on black field; thin central cross intersected by a decorative multi-band square, larger white square around border with floral designs along all sides
title: Huaxi Stitching Design
